altername_name: Shiroki Majo: Mou Hitotsu no Eiyuu Densetsu
name: Shiroki Majo: Mouhitotsu no Eiyuu Densetsu
overview: Shiroki Majo: Mouhitotsu no Eiyuu Densetsu (白き魔女 ～もうひとつの英雄伝説～) is an RPG by Falcom ported to the Sega Saturn in Japan by Hudson in 1998. It is the third entry in Falcom's The Legend of Heroes/Eiyuu Densetsu series, and the first entry in that series not to be part of the Dragon Slayer series.
